name: 3dClipLevel
author: AFNI Developers
description: Estimates the value at which to clip the anatomical dataset so that background regions are set to zero.

inputs.description: Use the number ff instead of 0.50 in the algorithm.
inputs.name: Fractional value

inputs.description: Apply the algorithm to each sub-brick separately.
inputs.name: Apply algorithm separately flag

inputs.description: Compute a 'gradual' clip level as a function of voxel position and output to a dataset with the given prefix.
inputs.name: Gradual clip level prefix
